{% extends "templates/end_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon::meta" %} {% set library_name = "Metaprogramming" %} {% set item_name = "type_list" %} {% set end_name = "contains" %} {% set templates = "" %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.overload_set([ " template [[nodiscard]] static constexpr bool contains() noexcept; " ])}}

Returns true if T is a type within this type_list, returns false otherwise.

{{macros.function_stats( [], "true if T is a type within this type_list, false otherwise.", "This function never throws exceptions", "Constant." )}} {{macros.example_code( " import cmoon.meta; int main() { using tl = cmoon::meta::type_list; if constexpr (tl::contains()) { return tl::index(); } else { return -1; } } " )}} {% endblock %}
